entry.title: WIND WARNING , Victoria Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:58 PM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Rain, 7.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Victoria Harbour 8:00 PM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Condition: Rain
Temperature: 7.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 90 %
Dewpoint: 5.9°C
Wind: WSW 42 km/h gust 60 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this evening then cloudy. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 except 70 gusting to 90 near Juan de Fuca Strait. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy late in the afternoon with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind west 30 km/h except gusting to 60 near Juan de Fuca Strait in the morning. Wind becoming light late in the afternoon. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers in the evening. Periods of rain beginning after midnight. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h after midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022
